annotation: (7), "To sit, to squat down, as when men sit on their heels"
(7), "To sit down on the ground without stool, mat, or other article". Ref. to (56) "leg/foot"

language: East Sumbanese, Umbu Ratu Nggai dialect

annotation: (1-1a), "Come and sit, there is a chair!"

language: Kadazan Dusun of Taginambur, Kota Belud, Sabah, Malaysia

annotation: Stay, live, sit, exist; to be left (Ebt)
'to sit on something which gives way'
Pollex 06: Hnoo. :Sit, stay, live (regarded as borrowig from Iai) (Hmn).
